# Arch

## Package Management

Full Upgrade:

```{.sh}
$ pacman -Syu
```

Install a package:

```{.sh}
pacman -S {package}
```

Remove package:

```{.sh}
$ pacman -R {package}
```

Remove package and dependencies:

```{.sh}
$ pacman -Rns {package}
```

List AUR packages:

```{.sh}
$ pacman -Qm
```
